title: Lesson 02 - One Minute German
description: In lesson 2 of One Minute German you will learn a few more useful words in German which you'll use every day. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute German at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com.
content:encoded: In lesson 2 of One Minute German you will learn a few more useful words in German which you'll use every day. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute German at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com.
itunes:subtitle: Learn how to say 'yes', 'no', 'please' and 'thank you' in German
